channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: MAGA Loses It After Minneapolis Mayor’s Emotional Speech on Shooting
The pile-on came after Cabinet members spent hours praising the president.
Millionaire Alexis Ohanian walked out of the LSAT 20 minutes in, went to a Waffle House and decided he was ‘gonna invent a career.’ He founded Reddit
What’s known so far about suspect in Minneapolis church mass shooting
Archaeologists Found a 1,400-Year-Old Cross That Solves a Christian Mystery
Shooting in Minneapolis is the latest carnage at a US school or college over the past 25 years
item.description: School shootings in the U.S. have claimed hundreds of lives over the past 25 years, with the tragedy often hitting hardest when children are involved

item.title: What to know about the shooting at a Minneapolis Catholic school
item.description: A shooter has opened fire during Mass at a Minneapolis Catholic school, killing two children and injuring 17 other people before killing himself

item.title: A Mississippi city's tax break spurred post-Katrina building. But will homes stand the next storm?
item.description: A decade after 2005's Hurricane Katrina, one Mississippi city began offering property tax breaks to encourage building near the waterfront

item.title: 1 year in prison for US border agent accused of ordering women to show their breasts

item.title: More records from Uvalde, Texas school shooting are being released after law firm error
